{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4182816,"totalDownVotes":763518,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":282133,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1081983,"totalDownVotes":115270,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":296538,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
I want to sincerely thank all of you who voted for Brookhaven and the amazing people in the Roblox community who come to play it. I was humbled to be nominated and am beyond grateful to be chosen, especially with so many incredible games and creators to choose from.

Thx for playing!"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":593047,"totalDownVotes":46093,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":74637,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1008937,"totalDownVotes":50617,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":48360,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 2.25q

👊Latest Update [UPDATE 18]:
- 💸SALE!
- 🌟SEASON 4!
- ⚔️NEW TOURNAMENT MODE!
- 💥3 NEW QUIRKS!
- 🔴1 NEW BLOODLINE!
- 🍋1 NEW FRUIT!
- 👿NEW BOSS!
- 🐰EASTER EVENT!
- 🌌NEW AURA CHEST!
- 🥚EASTER DECORATION!
- 🔥2 NEW POWERS!
- 🛡️5 NEW CHAMPIONS!
- 💪3 NEW TRAINING AREAS!
- ⚔️8 NEW SWORD SKINS!
- 🗡️1 NEW SWORD!
- ⚖️POWER BALANCING!

⭐Join BlockZone for a 5% increased training boost:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/5202664/BlockZone#!/about

🎁Follow us on Twitter for codes and updates on the game:
Director: @NyxunRBX
Head Developers: @RobxSoft, @_Chichine
Scripters: @_DevCrow, @eXo0ne_, @lyzrinn, @Dact_ylioglyph
Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3736555,"totalDownVotes":307768,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":66388,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2741786,"totalDownVotes":360013,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":32150,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":253879,"totalDownVotes":32828,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"(2x Item-Spawns) Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":21871,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":885576,"totalDownVotes":56704,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[2x Spawns] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":28061,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Tailed Spirit Ultimate Update:

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2062914,"totalDownVotes":285842,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":38356,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3208504,"totalDownVotes":279745,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":43737,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":133283,"totalDownVotes":7436,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA 🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":14584,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2304182,"totalDownVotes":241870,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":58449,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4343412,"totalDownVotes":587662,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":24916,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👀


🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":516991,"totalDownVotes":36028,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":21636,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities

🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool
🐤Developers: Tacomura, AStrongMuscle, MoltenPrime, AngeIicMar
🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1405971,"totalDownVotes":118307,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":31240,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Baue dir ein Schiff und setze die Segel, um dein Abenteuer zu starten!
Gefällt dir das Spiel? Dann vergiss nicht, einen Daumen nach oben (👍) zu hinterlassen, und favorisiere es (🌟). Danke!
Vergiss nicht, dir unsere Gruppe anzuschauen! www.roblox.com/groups/2782840/Chillz-Studios
Gruppenboni:
✨Member✨ --- 25% mehr Gold!
💫Mega Member💫 --- 300% mehr Leben! --- 25% mehr Gold!
🌟Royal Member🌟 --- +4 Fässer TNT! --- 300% mehr Leben! --- 25% mehr Gold!"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2109107,"totalDownVotes":651693,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":53828,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2183282,"totalDownVotes":299033,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":57844,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! Chat, play games, earn coins, and customize your very own estate! Play with millions of players who play MeepCity! 💙💙 

✨ We're working on more updates!

🔔Click the Follow button for update notifications! And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1181711,"totalDownVotes":67512,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":21181,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":688778,"totalDownVotes":93895,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🎑 [TOTEM UPDATE!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":18558,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"아일랜드에 오신것을 환영합니다!

🌲 당신만의 섬을 꾸며봐요
👩‍🌾 어마어마한 농장을 꾸려봐요
💸 아이템을 팔아 돈을 모아봐요
👨‍🍳 맛있는 간식을 만들어봐요
✨ 소중한 보물을 모아봐요
🔥 그리고 더 많은것들을 즐겨봐요!

🏃‍♀️ Update Log (August 16):
- Signs
- Obby Kit
- 3 new music disks (orange, green and purple)
- Fix a cause for buffalkors falling through the ground
- Small bug fixes and exploit patches

This was a light week for us. We're working on a much larger update aimed for next week. Keep an eye on twitter for details and leaks ✨

🎵 음악 출처: https://twitter.com/LawnReality"},{"creatorId":9277770,"creatorName":"Anime Legend Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":88976,"totalDownVotes":7251,"universeId":2317140681,"name":"[JOJO UPDATE] Anime Mania","placeId":6284881984,"playerCount":11242,"imageToken":"T_6284881984_34ef","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"This is Anime Mania. Upon joining the game, it is suggested that you spend some of the gems that you have rolling on a few characters. Then you should equip 3 of these characters in order to make your team. After making your team, you can play the game by starting a room and you can either invite your friends or play alone. Obtain more characters, win the arenas, and upgrade your characters! 

PC Controls:
Left Click: Basic Attack
Right Click: Heavy Attack
1,2,3,4- Character Skills
Jump + Left Click: Up Combo
Left Click In air: Air finish or simply use a move.

Inspired by Ani-Blox Legends, and All Star Tower Defense.

Owners: 123imnotm0mo and Yakrus
Developers: jacobman737, Lazarovip2,F33NY
Contributors: Swingset68, Arricku,Elikage,LightTheProtagonist, Rinanori"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1787909,"totalDownVotes":139529,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":7679,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":907988,"totalDownVotes":118214,"universeId":892043755,"name":"Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":10123,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🚨 UPDATE 74 🚨
🐰 Easter has arrived at Bubble Gum Simulator!
😮 Check out the event area in the main world!
🏆 10 eggs have been hidden - follow the clues to complete this year’s special Egg Hunt!
🥚 3 new eggs (Cracked Egg, Eastery Egg, Cosmic Egg)
🐶 48 new pets!
🔥 ????
💪 Complete Easter Event challenges every day to earn exclusive prizes!
🏆 Unlock special rewards for completing the Easter Pass!
🎮 Gamepad controls improved

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":262189,"totalDownVotes":138858,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":13730,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":509544,"totalDownVotes":42021,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":11617,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"В этом мире, никто не может выжить в одиночку. Объединяйтесь с друзьями и одолевайте бесконечные волны зомби, сражайтесь с боссами, зарабатывайте монеты, повышайте уровень, и покупайте юнитов! Если хотите испытать себя, тогда попробуйте победить боссов на более трудных сложностях!

👥💵 Вступите в группу что бы получить +$100 в начале раунда! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍Оцените игру и добавляйте в избранные если хотите увидеть больше качественных обновлений!🌟

🛠️ОБНОВЛЕНИЯ🛠️
+ БОСС ТАМПЛИЕР 💥
+ ИГРУШЕЧНЫЙ ЯЩИК 📦
+ КАРТА "SPRING FEVER" 🌼
+ УЛУЧШЕННЫЕ ЮНИТЫ
+ Исправлены ошибки 🛠️

Полный cпиcok изменений:
https://devforum.roblox.com/t/tower-defense-simulator-update-log

Разработчики:
🛠️Глав. Разработчик/Дизайнер: BelowNatural
📜Программист: Razuatix
🔨Строители: BiscuitTurtleKid и Beefchoplets
🎹Композитор: Phoqus
🔊Звуковой Дизайнер: BiddinUp"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":656888,"totalDownVotes":127539,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":6012,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rP52HEqECug 
Sieh dir den Trailer zur Vortax-Kiste an. 

Stürze dich in 5v5 teambasierte Feuergefechte auf einer Reihe von Karten aus allen Winkeln der Welt. 

Verdiene spieleigenes Geld, indem du Gegner eliminierst und Zielvorgaben erreichst. Gib dieses für neue Waffen, Zeug und Granaten zu Beginn jeder Runde aus. 

Drücke B beim Spawnen zum Öffnen des Kaufmenüs, drücke N, um das Menü zu öffnen. 

Du magst Egoshooter? Von uns gibt es noch vier andere Egoshooter, die du spielen kannst! 
Schau sie dir an: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2613928 

Folge diesen Leuten und erhalte Twitter-Codes:
